entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Fog patches late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Lake Ontario. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
